Private Label Wine Services at Red Brick Winery – Napa Valley

Get Started!

Craft Your Own

Custom Wine Label with Red Brick Winery

Nestled in the prestigious Napa Valley, Red Brick Winery is proud to be the hidden force behind multiple successful brands offering private label wine. Our expertise in custom wine branding has helped businesses, retailers, and individuals bring their unique wine labels to life. Whether you’re looking to enhance your brand, create a bespoke wine gift, or launch your own white label wine line, our team of expert winemakers is ready to assist you at every stage.

As a trusted partner for many established brands, Red Brick Winery ensures that every bottle carries the signature quality and reputation Napa Valley is known for.

WhyRed Brick WineryIs the Choice
Behind Leading Wine Brands

Custom Wine Selection for Your Own-Label Wine

We offer a broad range of Napa Valley wines that capture the rich diversity of this world-renowned wine region. From bold Cabernet Sauvignon to crisp Chardonnay and smooth Pinot Noir, Red Brick Winery provides you with premium selections that can be customized to align with your brand’s identity or event. We’ve helped countless businesses and individuals create their own private label wines, elevating their brands with our award-winning varietals.

Personalized Wine Labels and Signature Branding

Your brand deserves a label as distinct as the wine it represents. Our personalized wine labels are fully customizable, ensuring that your wine reflects your brand’s unique style and story. Whether you’re a retailer launching your own exclusive wine branding, a corporate entity creating custom wine branding for gifts, or an event planner seeking bespoke wine labeling, our team will collaborate with you to bring your vision to life. We’ve successfully created custom wine labels for multiple brands, helping them stand out with elegance and quality.

Flexible White Label Wine Production for Businesses and Events

Our white label wine services cater to both small and large orders, ensuring that we can meet the needs of businesses of all sizes. Whether you’re a boutique retailer looking for limited-run custom wines or a large business seeking bulk production, Red Brick Winery’s Napa Valley and Pennsylvania facilities deliver high-quality private label wines for every occasion. Our flexible approach allows us to work behind the scenes for multiple companies, each with their own label, helping them achieve success in their markets.

Napa Valley’s Trusted Wine Production Process

Napa Valley Wine Expertise

At Red Brick Winery, our Napa Valley production process is designed to ensure that each custom label wine meets the highest standards. From grape selection and harvesting to fermentation, aging, blending, and bottling, we oversee every detail with precision and care.

Our commitment to sustainable winemaking ensures that the wines we produce for your brand are not only of the highest quality but also environmentally responsible. Our success in creating private wine branding for a wide array of clients is a testament to our craftsmanship and attention to detail.

The Custom Wine Branding Process

Consultation

Start with a consultation to discuss your brand’s needs and how you want your own-label wine to represent you in the marketplace.

Wine Selection

Choose from our selection of premium Napa Valley wines, or let our team guide you in creating a custom blend tailored to your target audience.

Custom Label Design

Collaborate with our in-house designers to craft tailored wine labels that perfectly capture your brand’s identity and message.

Production & Bottling

Once your wine and label designs are finalized, we handle everything from production to bottling at our Napa Valley facilities, ensuring your private

Delivery

Your custom-branded wines will be expertly packaged and delivered, ready to take their place in the market or enhance your next event.

Perfect for Retailers, Corporate Gifts, and Special Occasions

Corporate Wine Gifts

Strengthen your brand with personalized wine labels that showcase your company’s identity while offering premium Napa Valley wines. Whether for client appreciation or holiday gifts, our custom wine branding services help leave a lasting impression.

Retailers

Differentiate yourself in the marketplace by offering private label wines that boast both high quality and custom branding. Our white label wine services have helped numerous businesses succeed with their own unique wine offerings.

Get Started!

Weddings & Events

Celebrate with signature wine branding designed exclusively for your occasion, creating a memorable and personalized experience. Our bespoke wine labeling ensures your event stands out with a unique touch.

Frequently Asked Questions
(FAQs)

Private label wine is wine made by a winery but branded under your name. This lets you create a unique label that reflects your brand or personal style. It’s perfect for businesses, events, or gifting.

It’s simple! Start with a consultation where we discuss your ideas. Then, choose from our Napa Valley wines, collaborate with our designers on the label, and we’ll take care of the production and delivery.

You can select from popular Napa Valley wines like Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, and Pinot Noir. Whether you want bold reds or crisp whites, we have options to suit your taste.

It typically takes 4 to 6 weeks to produce private label wines. This ensures everything, from label design to bottling, meets the highest quality standards.

Yes! We offer flexible options for businesses of all sizes—whether you need a small batch or a large-scale production, we’ve got you covered.

Just contact us to schedule a consultation. We’ll guide you through choosing your wine, designing your label, and overseeing production.

Yes! We create custom wine labels for events like weddings, corporate functions, and parties, adding a personal touch to your celebration.

Yes, we follow sustainable winemaking practices, so you can enjoy high-quality wine that’s made responsibly.

You’ll work with our design team to create a label that reflects your brand or event. We’ll help turn your ideas into a beautifully crafted label.

Absolutely! Personalized wine makes for thoughtful and unique gifts, whether for corporate clients, weddings, or special occasions.

Why Napa Valley Private Label Wines?

Choosing Napa Valley private label wines ensures that your custom wine is sourced from one of the most prestigious wine regions in the world. Red Brick Winery’s dedication to quality and sustainability means that every bottle reflects the rich tradition of Napa Valley winemaking. With years of experience working behind the scenes for multiple brands, we bring that same expertise and care to your own-label wine.

Pricing and Lead Time

Our private label wine pricing is tailored to suit your needs, with options ranging from boutique batches to large-scale production. Lead times typically range from 4 to 6 weeks, giving you ample time to prepare for your launch or event while ensuring your custom wine branding is produced to the highest standard.

Get Started!

Contact Red Brick Winery for Your Own Private Wine Branding

Join the ranks of successful brands and businesses that trust Red Brick Winery to bring their private label wine vision to life. Our team is here to guide you through every step of the process, from wine selection to bespoke wine labeling, ensuring that your brand’s wine is as unique and exceptional as you are.
